publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1578 Pauline McNeill: 50th Anniversary of the Royal Scottish Academy of Music and Drama—That the Parliament congratulates the Royal Scottish Academy of Music and Drama on achieving its 50th anniversary.
S1M-1578 50th Anniversary of the Royal Scottish Academy of Music and Drama (lodged on 23 January 2001) Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Mr Jamie Stone*

S1M-1578 Pauline McNeill: 50th Anniversary of the Royal Scottish Academy of Music and Drama—That the Parliament congratulates the Royal Scottish Academy of Music and Drama on achieving its 50th anniversary. Supported by: Mr Kenneth Gibson, Mr Jamie Stone
S1M-1578 50th Anniversary of the Royal Scottish Academy of Music and Drama (lodged on 23 January 2001) Shona Robison*, David Mundell*
S1M-1578 50th Anniversary of the Royal Scottish Academy of Music and Drama (lodged on 23 January 2001) Irene McGugan*, Michael Russell*
S1M-1578 50th Anniversary of the Royal Scottish Academy of Music and Drama (lodged on 23 January 2001) Donald Gorrie*, Mr Michael McMahon*, Karen Gillon*, Ms Sandra White*, Fiona Hyslop*
S1M-1578 50th Anniversary of the Royal Scottish Academy of Music and Drama (lodged on 23 January 2001) Alex Neil*, Trish Godman*, Cathy Peattie*, Irene Oldfather*

S1M-1578 Pauline McNeill: 50th Anniversary of the Royal Scottish Academy of Music and Drama—That the Parliament congratulates the Royal Scottish Academy of Music and Drama on achieving its 50th anniversary. Supported by: Mr Kenneth Gibson, Mr Jamie Stone, Shona Robison, David Mundell, Irene McGugan, Michael Russell, Donald Gorrie, Mr Michael McMahon, Karen Gillon, Ms Sandra White, Fiona Hyslop, Alex Neil, Trish Godman, Cathy Peattie, Irene Oldfather
